title: 14K Gold Continuous Endless Hinged Hoop Earrings (1.5mm Tube)
features: SIZE: Earrings Diameter: 20mm - small (0.78 in); Tube Width: 1.5mm - thin (0.05 in); Closure: Hinged Post, Continuous Endless Style; This item is 14 karat gold and not gold-plated. These earrings are small; please refer to the photos on the left for an accurate idea of the size.

STYLE: These may look like ordinary endless hoop earrings, but their tiny wire build holds a convenient little secret: They’re actually hinged! Just pull the post up and away from the hoop, slide it easily in your ear, and then slip the post into the tube in the back of your ear. An endless hoop that’s easy to put on? It’s what everyone wants yet they are so hard to find! This hoop combines the look of a traditional endless hoop with the easy-to-wear convenience of a hinged design.

SMALL HOOP EARRINGS: The small 20mm size is perfect as a beginner’s earring. They are also great for wearing throughout your day, from the workplace to a night on the town! They are small and hug your earlobe. A secure continuous design and hinged post means these once these hoops are on, they are not going anywhere.

LOVE HOOP EARRINGS? So do we! Check out our huge selection by searching Amazon for "LooptyHoops" or clicking the LooptyHoops at the top of this page right above this product's title. There are hoops made of 14k yellow, rose and white gold, as well as gold-plated hoops and sterling silver hoops. There are different thickness of the hoop tubes available, too.
PACKAGING: Each item comes neatly packaged in an attractive LooptyHoops jewelry gift box along with instructions on wearing and caring for your jewelry and a discount code valid on future purchases.
description: These may look like ordinary endless hoop earrings, but their tiny wire build holds a convenient little secret: they’re actually hinged. You just pull the post up and away from the hoop, insert it in your ear easily, and then slip the post into the tube in the back of your ear. It’s what everyone wants yet they are so hard to find! This hinged hoop combines the look of a traditional endless hoop with the easy-to-wear convenience of a hinged design. Perfect as a beginner’s earring for teens, or as a versatile accessory for adults, these gold hoops can do it all. Use the 10-12mm size for multiple ear piercings, nose piercings, or even eyebrow piercings. Available in 8 sizes from small to large, and in rose, white, and yellow gold, they are sure to brighten up your day.
These hoops are 14k gold with a hollow interior. Every hoop comes with an authenticated 14k stamp.
